content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get the yarn at wecrochet click here for yarn brava tweed worsted 6 ** the **granny all the way stocking collection** crochet pattern set features 7 unique granny stitch stockings each with its own delightful colorwork design these fun and festive stockings are perfect for adding a cozy handmade touch to your holiday decorations whether you hang them by the fireplace or use them as cheerful accents around the house they ll bring joy for years to come with their timeless charm these stockings are sure to become a treasured part of your holiday traditions perfect for crocheters of all levels this stocking pattern collection comes with detailed instructions including a full video tutorial construction is easy-peasy - we ll start by making a toe then work the body in your chosen colorwork design leaving a heel opening then we ll add a ribbed top to the stocking and finish by adding a heel feel free to add a hanging tag bells tassels or any other embellishments crochet hook h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 clover tassel maker 5 yarn brava tweed worsted 6 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g colorways shown wren wasabi mink and boysenberry yardage approximately 265 total yards per stocking see table on page 4 of pattern for variation in exact yardage per color yarn substitutions brava worsted 7 100 % premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch 8 80% acrylic 20% superwash wool 208yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 9 100% ultra soft acrylic 180yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet rs - right side slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 10 ws - wrong side gauge 15 sts x 9 row = 4 x4 in granny stitch with 5 0mm hook not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 one size stocking is roughly 17 5 long 6 5 wide skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 12 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 13 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 14 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 15 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 16 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 17 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this
